title: kurai tIravE
sahitya:
kurai tIravE siridu karuNai kUruvAi tirai kaDark-karaiyilE uraiyum murugA en


anupallavi

  varaiyarai illAmal vAri aruT-koDaiyai vazhangi varum vaDivazhagA aDiyEnadu


caraNam    puraiyODi ennuLLam puNNAkkiDum varai pullaDiyEniDam kal manam koLLAdE
pirai shUDi ADum shivaperumAn tanayanE kura vEDak-kOmaghan kumariyin kaNavanE
